Text.val: 06.03.2006 SH Requested by John Fixed bug in task Select coun(SQL), the storage
type of v.counter was packed decimal instead of Signed integer
on 13.1.2006 WJ SCR9986 do not print empty report
Variable SQL parts for TPCH_CURRENCY <> CLNT08_ACC_CURR
Then currencies other than client currency

ExpSyntax.val: 'and TPCH_ADMNO = CLNT101_ADMNO and TPCH_CLNTNO = CLNT102_CLNTNO and TPCH_CURRENCY <> CLNT108_ACC_CURR'
MlsTrans ('Overview entered cheques with currency other than client currency')&' '&DStr (Date (),'DD.MM.YYYY')

SQL_STMT_U.val: select count(*) from :1/TPCH, :1/HUSR :3 where TPCH_USERID = HUSR_ID and HUSR_HOFF_CODE = ':2' :4 for fetch only

select TPCH_CHEQUENUMBER, TPCH_CURRENCY, TPCH_AMOUNTCURRCHEQUE, TPCH_ADMNO, TPCH_CLNTNO, TPCH_BANKDEBTOR, TPCH_BANKACCOUNTDEBTOR, TPCH_LETTERCODE, TPCH_BANK_ADMNO, TPCH_BANK_LEDG_NO, TPCH_USERID from :1/TPCH, :1/HUSR :3 where TPCH_USERID = HUSR_ID and HUSR_HOFF_CODE = ':2' :4 order by TPCH_BANK_ADMNO, TPCH_BANK_LEDG_NO, TPCH_CURRENCY, TPCH_LETTERCODE, TPCH_COUNTRYDEBTOR, TPCH_USERID, TPCH_ID for fetch only

Text.val: TPCH is part of Factorlink(Temp) as result Magic doesn't allow Link join to HUSR
